text: Maram aduna Tengban Mapuna thambiba ngamkhei adudagi hendokna atoppasingna touba thabak adugi maramda eikhoina chaothokchade. Madugi mahutta Tengban Mapuna thambiba ngamkhei adugi manungda matam pumnamakta eikhoina nakhoigi marakta henna chaoba thabak touba ngamnaba nakhoigi thajaba hengatpa aduda eikhoina asha toujei.
